# TronService

>直接生成地址 
```angular2html
  \Kaadon\TronService\Credential::create()->address();
```
>通过私钥生成地址
```angular2html
\Kaadon\TronService\Credential::fromPrivateKey('0880d6667c5bdc79af33c4e7df15e3f22fd2ab9cbd4d5d14e863e08504f1c509');
```
